A painting of Tintin by the Belgian artist Hergé yesterday sold for 3.2 million in Paris, breaking the record for the most expensive original comic book art sold at auction in history.

articles.title: Siegfried & Roy: Magician Siegfried Fischbacher dies aged 81 - Sky News
articles.description: Siegfried Fischbacher and Roy Horn were world renowned for their Las Vegas magic shows involving white lions and tigers.

articles.title: Dan Stevens says Judi Dench's reaction to 'Cats' was too sweary to repeat - NME

articles.content:
